+++ General
Fast search operates wiki wide and is driven by the search field in the WikidPad toolbar. To use it:
	1. click with the mouse in the field
	2. type the text to search for
	3. press enter
The result is a list of pages where it found a match. To go to one of the pages shown, either:
	* navigate to it with the cursor keys and press Enter
	* double click it with the mouse
Fast search supports [RegEx |regex].
